title: Science Curriculum Utilizing Rule-Based AI Chatbots for 6th-Grade Optics Unit

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Personalized learning environments using personal devices, visualization of optical phenomena through VR simulations, and enhanced interaction with rule-based chatbots

learning_goals: Students can explain the principles of optical phenomena (reflection, refraction, dispersion, etc.) with over 80% accuracy through interaction with an AI chatbot
Learners manipulate light paths in a VR simulation environment, observe and record experimental results, and perform the scientific reasoning process three or more times
All learners show a 15% or greater increase in interest in science compared to baseline in weekly formative assessments, with female students demonstrating over 20% improvement
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
